title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.10 - Modification of conditions of participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.10 - Modification of conditions of participation

State Regulations
(a) Conditions of participation shall be
modified, as necessary, by the director. (b) Any modification of the conditions of
participation shall involve the youth and, to the extent feasible, the
parent. (c) All modifications shall
be in writing and signed in the same manner as the original conditions of
participation. (d) A copy of the
modification shall be given to the youth and to the parent. (e) A refusal by a youth to consent to a
modification shall result in termination of the youth's participation in a day
placement program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
178.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
